meanings: bury a dead body (in the ground)

vlive.korean: [#비주얼_빼면_시체=편치&문별] 우리 비주얼 빼면 시체지~ Without visuals, we're a dead body. 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : [Special] MOONBYUL's Weird Day Vlog #1
vlive.english: Without visuals, we're a dead body.

vlive.korean: [나 예삐시야 예삐빼면 시체야] - 애빼시 - 애빼시가 뭐야? [I'm nothing without Eh-bbeh-si] - Eh-bbeh-si. - What's that? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [AB6IX] 📖2019 휘웅휘웅 신조어 사전📖 에빼시: 에삐 빼면 시체(ღˇ◡ˇ*)♡ (Woong&DaeHwi talking about neologism)
vlive.english: [I'm nothing without Eh-bbeh-si] - Eh-bbeh-si. - What's that?

vlive.korean: [하버드 설립 이래 최고 목표가 웅둥이 스카웃이라네요] 애교 빼면 시체! [Apparently, Havard's biggest goal is to get Woong in their school] Nothing without being cute! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [AB6IX] 📖2019 휘웅휘웅 신조어 사전📖 에빼시: 에삐 빼면 시체(ღˇ◡ˇ*)♡ (Woong&DaeHwi talking about neologism)
vlive.english: [Apparently, Havard's biggest goal is to get Woong in their school] Nothing without being cute!

vlive.korean: 애정 빼면 시체? Nothing without love? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.61
안경 빼면 시체. A body if you take off the glasses. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 보고싶었~스테이😘
vlive.english: A body if you take off the glasses.

examples.korean: Detectives found no marks on the body. 발음듣기 형사들은 그 시체에서 아무런 흔적도 찾지 못했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Detectives found no marks on the body. 발음

examples.korean: His decapitated body was found floating in a canal. 발음듣기 목이 잘린 그의 시체가 운하에 떠오른 것이 발견되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His decapitated body was found floating in a canal. 발음

examples.korean: The body was discovered when builders excavated the area. 발음듣기 건축업자들이 그 지역을 팠을 때 그 시체가 발견되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The body was discovered when builders excavated the area. 발음

examples.korean: Analysis showed that traces of arsenic were present in the body. 발음듣기 분석을 통해 그 시체 속에서 비소의 흔적이 있음이 드러났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Analysis showed that traces of arsenic were present in the body. 발음

examples.korean: ‘Good place to bury the bodies,’ she joked with black humour. 발음듣기 “시체 묻기에 좋은 장소군.” 그녀가 블랙 유머로 농담을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Good place to bury the bodies,’ she joked with black humour. 발음
